category.name: Family Prayers
category.description: Prayers for family devotion and spiritual growth

content.text:
GIVER OF EVERYTHING,
Another day is over,
and I'm coming to the foot of my great Savior's cross,
where healing flows,
where comfort is poured into every wound,
where I'm washed clean again,
confident that when You look at me, You see no stain of sin.

I know my time here is short before I go to be with You.
Help me to focus my mind, to live with purpose, and to move with urgency as if every moment were my last,
so that my life can be full of joy, and my death will be glorious.

I thank You for the everyday blessings of this world—
the fresh air,
the sunlight,
the food that gives me strength,
the clothes I wear,
the house that shelters me,
the sleep that gives me rest,
the starry sky at night,
the summer breeze,
the smell of flowers,
the sound of running water,
and the love of family and friends.

Everything, living and not, adds to my comfort.
My cup is overflowing with blessings.
Don't let me take these daily mercies for granted.
Your hand gives me blessings, and Your power protects me from evil.

I also bring my thanks for spiritual gifts—
the deep warmth of faith,
the encouraging presence of Your Spirit,
the strength of Your will that holds me back from sin,
and the way You shut down the enemy's attacks.

Praise to my Lord, who is in control of everything!
